magic_link.title: Check your email
magic_link.description: It has a magic link that will sign you in to the app

dashboard.subtitle: Launchtoday is a production ready starter kit to ship your next AI, chat, e-commerce (and more) mobile app.

quick_start.title: Quick to get started
quick_start.description: Hit the ground running with our pre-configured setup. Start building your app features right away without the initial setup hassle.

latest_tools.title: Supports latest tools
latest_tools.description: Stay ahead with cutting-edge React Native tools and libraries. We keep the boilerplate updated with the most recent and efficient development tools.

support.title: Ongoing support and features
support.description: Benefit from continuous updates and community-driven feature requests. We're committed to evolving Launchtoday based on developer needs.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.description: Make one-off payments via the pre-built Stripe UI.

screen.title: Stripe
screen.subtitle: Process payments securely with Stripe. Launchtoday supports Stripe for flexible payment options and seamless transactions.
